job_description:
- Assist the recruitment team in the end-to-end hiring process.
- Help post job advertisements on job portals, career websites, and social media.
- Screen resumes and shortlist potential candidates based on job requirements.
- Schedule interviews and coordinate with candidates and hiring managers.
- Assist in conducting initial interviews or assessments (if required).
- Update and maintain candidate databases and recruitment tracking sheets.
- Support employer branding initiatives and recruitment marketing activities.
- Assist in preparing recruitment reports and weekly hiring updates.
- Perform administrative tasks related to recruitment and talent acquisition.
